topic: rtrace error message "only single process supported"
body:
Hello all,
I tried to use rtrace -n option like below, but returned error message was
"only single process supported". Why can I use parallel calculation?


rtrace -I -h -dp 2048 -ar 32 -ms 0.063 -ds .2 -dt .05 -dc .75 -dr 3 -n 2
-st .01 -ab 5 -aa .1 -ad 2048 -as 256 -av 0.01 0.01 0.01 -lr 12 -lw .0005
 -af ***.amb ***.oct < ***.pts > ***.dat


My computer specs are
OS:Windows XP professional SP3
CPU:core 2 duo T9300  2.5Ghz ( I command rtrace -n 2 )
Memory : 3GB
Radiance windows binaries are downloaded from here.
http://openstudio.nrel.gov/getting-started-developer/getting-started-radiance


Thank you for all your advice.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2012-March/008467.html).</sup>
